topic: dow closes more than 450 points lower, s&p 500 pulls back from record: live updates

text: The stock market has taken a dramatic turn
The Dow has plummeted more than 450 points
The S&P 500 has pulled back from its record high
Investors are on edge and wondering what's next
As of today, January 8th, 2026, the Dow Jones has closed at a significant loss
The point drop is over 450 points, a substantial decline from its previous close
The S&P 500 index has experienced a notable pullback
Investors are reassessing the market and adjusting their portfolios
Many stocks have experienced significant losses
The decline in the stock market has been confirmed by multiple financial sources
The exact numbers and percentages reflect the market's volatility
The impact of various economic factors on investor confidence is unclear
It remains to be seen what factors will drive the stock market in the coming days
Analysts and investors are waiting to see how the situation will unfold
